title: [LFT] Plat 3 - Jungle/Top/Adc main - Looking for Serious Team

embed.description: Check your Summoner statistics, MMR, realtime spectate and using powerful global LoL Charts!

body:
Looking for a serious team for consistent play focusing on improving and achieving our highest. I'm currently plat 3 looking to grind some solo que and rank up. I have had previous experience in competitive play including the QUT Lcs Autum split playing as jungle/shotcaller and the oceanic-collegiate-championship playing as top lane. I'm always update to date with the meta and competitive play from all regions and keen to get into some serious league.  

Please only serious considerations.

IGN: mlg JONO
